text: Rewterz Managed XDR accelerates and enhances incident response and the Security Operations Center (SOC). Rewterz Managed XDR combines incident response methodologies with advanced context from security components. Rewterz Managed XDR response with more advanced methods than typical infrastructure control points such as networks and terminals. Rewterz Managed XDR detects complex threats automatically and with minimum adjustment. Rewterz Managed XDR automates repetitive procedures and saves analysts time. Rewterz Managed XDR offers a centralized workflow and management for all analyst tiers.
